Name: Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer
About the game: In Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer you are a hacker trying to find compromised photos of a drug dealer wanted by the FBI. Destroy the blocks and see the most hot pics of her. ♥ 5 unique hot pics ot the most dangerous drug dealer of the Pleasurepunk Universe. ♥ Calm and relaxing music so that nothing disturbs your game. ♥ Fun and very hot gameplay. ♥ If you like Cyberpunk and a very hot girl, this one is for you.
